Changeset.Change: First release
Fixed bugs preventing the portlet to load
Improved the importers' UI
Dynamic discovery of the backend service
Fixed TSV Importer
Added WFS Importer
Added ShapeFile Importer
Added Layers Management
Added Tags Management
Replaced ASL with Portal Context
Added Styles Management
Added Layer Import Monitor
Added Template Layer import option on Shapefile Importer
Added EndpointManager for caching endpoints
Enriched Layers Management with diverse functionality
Added GeoTIFF importer.
Layer imports statuses on "Import Monitor" are now selectable and can be cleared using the new button "Clear"
Fixed a bug where tags were not being processed properly (empty keywords) on ShapeFile/TSV importers.
Fixed date sorting on "Import Monitor"
Added functionality "Add External Layer" on Layers Management
Added functionality "Edit attribute presenation" on Layers Management
Fixed some issues with Plugins Management
Fixed tabs width to be more responsive. Corrected some tab descriptions
Refactored Layers Management code and UI
Added functionality "Download Layer" on Layers Management. Can be either shapefile or geotiff
Added functionality "Publish On GeoNetwork" on Layers Management
Reworked WFS importer. Improved UI.
Layer importers now have the option for importing a Layer on Geonetwork.
